about_the_game: Dominate the ring with 10 electrifying electro swing tracks in the FREE "Electro Swing" DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Jive to the beats and melodies as you throw knockout punches in this FREE DLC! Filled with vintage vibes and a modern twist.
detailed_description: Dominate the ring with 10 electrifying electro swing tracks in the FREE "Electro Swing" DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Jive to the beats and melodies as you throw knockout punches in this FREE DLC! Filled with vintage vibes and a modern twist.
